name: lite-monitor
description: A event tracking library for Node.js and Web

scripts.build:app: yarn workspace backend build && yarn workspace frontend build
scripts.build:lib: yarn workspace @lite-monitor/base build && yarn workspace @lite-monitor/node build && yarn workspace @lite-monitor/web build
scripts.dev:app: yarn workspace backend dev & yarn workspace frontend dev
scripts.publish:lib: yarn workspace @lite-monitor/base publish --access public && yarn workspace @lite-monitor/node publish --access public && yarn workspace @lite-monitor/web publish --access public
